protein.specific_function: Acts as repressor of transcription (By similarity). Has histone acetyltransferase activity, with a preference for histone H4.

go_class.description: cellular component organization at cellular level

reference.reference_text: Lahn BT, Page DC: Retroposition of autosomal mRNA yielded testis-specific gene family on human Y chromosome. Nat Genet. 1999 Apr;21(4):429-33.
